parameters.query:
SELECT od.operator_id, od.tenant_id 
FROM operator_devices od
WHERE od.session_token = '{{ $('Webhook').item.json.headers["x-session-token"] }}'
AND od.device_type = 'mobile'
AND EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 FROM operators o 
  WHERE o.id = od.operator_id 
  AND o.is_active = true
)
LIMIT 1;

WITH vals AS (
SELECT
'{{ $json.tenant_id || "" }}' AS tenant_id_text,
'{{ $json.appeal_id || "" }}' AS appeal_id_text,
'{{ $json.limit || 50 }}' AS limit_text
),
validated AS (
SELECT
CASE WHEN tenant_id_text ~* '^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$' THEN tenant_id_text::uuid ELSE NULL END AS tenant_id,
CASE WHEN appeal_id_text ~* '^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$' THEN appeal_id_text::uuid ELSE NULL END AS appeal_id,
CASE WHEN limit_text ~ '^[0-9]+$' THEN LEAST(GREATEST(limit_text::int, 1), 200) ELSE 50 END AS lim
FROM vals
)
SELECT
a.id, a.stage, a.operation_mode, a.updated_at,
a.estimated_cost, a.estimated_time, a.phone_model, a.brand_id, a.model_id, a.repair_type_id, a.deal_type_id, a.parts_owner,
c.name AS client_name, c.phone AS client_phone,
b.name AS brand_name, m.name AS model_name, rt.name AS repair_type_name, dt.name AS deal_type_name,
(
  SELECT oa.details->>'ai_response'
  FROM operator_actions oa
  WHERE oa.context_appeal_id = a.id
    AND oa.action_type = 'notify_appeal_ready'
    AND oa.details->>'ai_response' IS NOT NULL
  ORDER BY oa.created_at DESC
  LIMIT 1
) AS ai_response,
(
SELECT jsonb_agg(
jsonb_build_object(
'created_at', mh.created_at,
'message_type', mh.message_type,
'message_text', mh.message_text
)
ORDER BY mh.created_at DESC
)
FROM messages_history mh
WHERE mh.appeal_id = a.id
LIMIT (SELECT lim FROM validated)
) AS messages,
(
SELECT jsonb_agg(
jsonb_build_object(
'id', ad.id,
'device_order', ad.device_index,
'brand_id', ad.brand_id,
'brand_name', adb.name,
'model_id', ad.model_id,
'model_name', adm.name,
'phone_model', ad.phone_model,
'status', ad.status,
'repairs', (
  SELECT jsonb_agg(
    jsonb_build_object(
      'id', ar.id,
      'repair_category_id', ar.repair_category_id,
      'repair_category_name', rc.name,
      'issue_type_id', ar.issue_type_id,
      'issue_type_name', it.name,
      'parts_owner', ar.parts_owner,
      'status', ar.status,
      'priority', ar.priority
    )
    ORDER BY ar.priority NULLS LAST, ar.created_at
  )
  FROM appeal_repairs ar
  LEFT JOIN repair_categories rc ON rc.id = ar.repair_category_id
  LEFT JOIN issue_types it ON it.id = ar.issue_type_id
  WHERE ar.appeal_device_id = ad.id
)
)
ORDER BY ad.device_index NULLS LAST, ad.created_at
)
FROM appeal_devices ad
LEFT JOIN brands adb ON adb.id = ad.brand_id
LEFT JOIN models adm ON adm.id = ad.model_id
WHERE ad.appeal_id = a.id
) AS devices
FROM validated v
JOIN appeals a
ON v.tenant_id IS NOT NULL
AND v.appeal_id IS NOT NULL
AND a.tenant_id = v.tenant_id
AND a.id = v.appeal_id
JOIN clients c ON c.id = a.client_id AND c.tenant_id = a.tenant_id
LEFT JOIN brands b ON b.id = a.brand_id AND b.tenant_id = a.tenant_id
LEFT JOIN models m ON m.id = a.model_id AND m.tenant_id = a.tenant_id
LEFT JOIN repair_types rt ON rt.id = a.repair_type_id AND rt.tenant_id = a.tenant_id
LEFT JOIN deal_types dt ON dt.id = a.deal_type_id;
